rules
part of tidymodels 0.1.0.9000

    • What's the difference between Cubist and RuleFit?
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

rules (development version) Unreleased

  • Added tidy() methods for cubist and RuleFit models to get back the rules and model coefficients.

rules 0.1.0 2020-10-28

  • The default encoding methods were changed such that parsnip will respect the encoding that the underlying model uses.

rules 0.0.3 2020-10-02

  • Documentation changes (some demanded by CRAN).

  • Changes to make rules work well with PSOCK cluster parallelism.

rules 0.0.2 2020-06-10

  • Changes for new dplyr version.

rules 0.0.1 2020-05-20

  • First CRAN release

Contents

rules is a part of the tidymodels ecosystem, a collection of modeling packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy.

Developed by Max Kuhn. Site built by pkgdown.
